title: Home Page
content:
Home Page # Hi, I am Mu-Tsing (慕青), a first year Ph.D. student at CUHK, Shenzhen campus. I am interested in general mathematics and compute science.
On Hand Things # Matroid Theory Fundamentals Coding Theory Linear Block Code Trellis Graph and Its Complexity Website Features Update # Math Equation Support. 2025-04-10
Now, I can use KaTex to write math equation:
$$ S_1 \rhd S_2 \rhd ... \rhd S_n $$ pdf files embedded. 2025-04-10
The pdf files are embedded by hugo-embed-pdf-shortcode, which use the relative path to include a pdf file. It is conflict with the tags function.
The one need to include the file in the content folder manually.
